Turlock.Cortez, California:
Cortez is an unincorporated community in Merced County, California. It is located on the Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railroad 11.5 miles (19 km) northwest of Atwater, at an elevation of 141 feet (43 m).
Founding
Some of California's early agricultural colonies owe their birth to the idealism of Abiko Kyutaro.
